Reviews.Title: I LOVE this lil camera!
Reviews.Author: Summrrgrrl
Reviews.Content: I got this camera at Walmart last year but my dog chewed it so I had to get another one and I couldnt find it at Walmart and looked on Amazon and there it was! lol I was so happy because this camera was GREAT for slipping in your purse to go to concerts or anywhere for fast photos and the transfer from camera to computer was the BEST! Just PLUG n PLAY...totally easy!! I recommend this camera for anyone who wants an easy to operate good digital camera..

Reviews.Title: Excelent!!!
Reviews.Author: Cristian L.
Reviews.Content: I love this camera cause its really functional and had a great price it was the best thing i buy this year

Reviews.Title: Not that good
Reviews.Author: Devil
Reviews.Content: the quality is decent but the audio is HORRIBLE if im 10ft away from it and say somthing normllyit wont register when i play the video

Reviews.Title: It's okay..
Reviews.Author: Abbymariepurdy
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my mom for Mother's Day for $50. It's an alright camera, but once you start zooming, pictures become so grainy, even outdoors. If you don't zoom and you're inside, the pictures are still grainy. There isn't much focus in many pictures, either.

Reviews.Title: Good Simple Camera
Reviews.Author: anomely
Reviews.Content: I wanted an inexpensive, simple camera that provides sound quality pics.This camera was perfect for my needs. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Handy small camera
Reviews.Author: Sharon Bancroft
Reviews.Content: Very versatile and easy to carry. Need to charge a lot if you are doing flash and video. Great photos. Good zoom.

Reviews.Title: Not as Expected
Reviews.Author: Marie
Reviews.Content: Thought it would be a great improvement on my older Kodak camera, because I needed a rechargeable camera.  Went to concert and couldn't get any clear zoom-in pictures. The SDHD card would not let me import pictures on my computer.  The directions were minimal and did not include information I needed.  I have to go back to where I bought it to see if a young tech savvy clerk can help explain what I need to know.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use little camera
Reviews.Author: Joanne Marble
Reviews.Content: Such an easy to use camera.  Takes great pictures.  Only problem I have is that I lost the cord to charge it and it is now out of charge and I am not able to use it.

ProductInfo.Features:
14 megapixel resolution
3.0" touch panel LCD display
Movie recording
Digital Anti-Shake
Sanyo 5x zoom lens
ProductInfo.Name: Sanyo 14MP Digital Camera w/ 5x Optical Zoom, 3" LCD Display - RED Color
